add.description: Adds a new person or animal record to the system.
examples: add animal n/Bob d/Brown tabby with stripes l/Near Block 14 canteen
add person n/John Doe p/91234567 e/johndoe@gmail.com t/friend t/funny

delete.description: Deletes an existing animal, person or feeding session from the system. All fields should be exact.
formats: delete feed n/ANIMAL_NAME f/PERSON_NAME dt/YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM
examples: delete feed n/Max f/John Doe dt/2023-10-15 14:30

edit.description: Edits an existing record from the system. The name given should be exact.
examples: edit person John Doe p/98765432 e/funny@gmail.com

find.description: Searches a record from the system that matches partially by name or fully by tag.

help.description: Opens the help window, or shows detailed help for a specified command.

list.description: Lists all persons and animals in the system.

clear.description: Clears all stored person and animal records.

feed.description: Adds a feeding session, involving an animal (being fed), a person (feeder), and a date and time.

view.description: Opens a window displaying the details of a specified person or animal. (This window can also be opened by double-clicking on the respective entry in the main app window.)
